name: BabXRecorder
description:
BabxRec is a lightweight, high-performance screen recording application designed for creators, gamers, and professionals who need smooth, reliable recordings without heavy system load. With support for up to 2K resolution recording even on low-end PCs and laptops, BabxRec delivers lag-free performance and saves videos directly in MP4 format without quality loss. Its sleek, minimal UI ensures an intuitive user experience, while built-in optimizations prevent file corruption and ensure long, stable recording sessions.

Whether youâ€™re capturing gameplay, creating tutorials, or recording presentations, BabxRec is your go-to tool for effortless screen recording.
